title: Shower Sounds
description:
Welcome to episode 32 of Sleep and Relax ASMR! Today's episode features a soothing and continuous recording of a running shower. A much more efficient and cheaper way to relax than actually letting the shower run!

DOWNLOAD the show:

iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/sleep-and-relax-asmr/id1133320064?mt=2

Stitcher: http://www.stitcher.com/podcast/sleep-and-relax-asmr

TuneIn Radio: http://tunein.com/radio/Sleep-and-Relax-ASMR-p899136/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9IhPKZIhfT3CVtLbsiAvhw

Libsyn: http://sleepandrelaxasmr.libsyn.com/

Get in touch with the show: SleepandRelaxASMR@Gmail.com

We would greatly appreciate if you subscribe and rate the show on iTunes; it really helps motivate us to make the show!
